attributes.action: Lower the interest rate on tax owed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you owe tax then the interest on monies owed is a killer, I always thought loan sharks were illegal however the government charge more interest than them.  The government is suppose to minimise bankruptcy not increase it.  Paying the tax and small inerest is notthe issue its the bully boy tactics and high interest the government use.
